column2: Hove Education Online: BHCC website for schools PRINTABLE VERSION</title>

column1: <!-- Brighton & Hove City Council - Education Online skin -->
This page looks plain and unstyled because you're using a

non-standard compliant browser. Please upgrade to a browser that supports web standards as soon as possible. Staff within Brighton & Hove City Council can call the ICT Helpdesk on 292001. Staff within schools should contact their ICT Coordinator or ICT Support Staff. Everyone else can get useful information from The Web Standards Project's Browser Upgrade initiative.
Brighton & Hove Education Online Printable version
• BHCC Phonebook (due to data protection issues this facility is available only with schools)
• Schools Contacts and Performance Information: view contact details for all educational establishments in Brighton &
column2: Hove, and key stage/gcse data for&nbsp

column1: • School Visits: schools may log on and check the status of visits from Children, familes and Schools staff.
• Key documents, proformas and publications to view or download. Use the WAT to add documents to this area.
• Schools website templates: information on the service by which schools can create and maintain a website with no technical expertise required.
• Software: useful software for download, including browser plugins and compression software.
• Client Contracts: Information on all of the services that Client Contracts provides to schools
